channel.title: Contravariance. A Swift Podcast
channel.description: A podcast about Apple, Swift and other programming topics. By Benedikt Terhechte and Bas Broek.
channel.itunes:author: Bas Broek / Benedikt Terhechte
channel.itunes:summary: A podcast about Apple, Swift and other programming topics. By Benedikt Terhechte and Bas Broek.
channel.itunes:keywords: apple, swift, mac, iphone, ipad, macos, mojave, rust

item.title: 204: let substring = string[string.index(string.startIndex, offsetBy: 5) ..< string.index(string.startIndex, offsetBy: 15)]
item.itunes:author: Bas Broek / Benedikt Terhechte
item.description: try! Swift Tokyo, Swift 5, Strings in Swift, Apple Subscriptions, and picks of the week

item.title: 203: Technical Writing
item.itunes:author: Bas Broek / Benedikt Terhechte
item.description: On technical writing and editing, finding unused code, and more.
item.itunes:summary: On technical writing and editing, finding unused code, and more.

item.title: 202: Putting Pieces in Place
item.itunes:author: Bas Broek / Benedikt Terhechte
item.description: Solving puzzles, algorithms, macros, and Swift 5.
item.itunes:summary: Solving puzzles, algorithms, macros, and Swift 5.

item.title: 201: application(_:willContinueUserActivityWithType:)
item.itunes:author: Bas Broek / Benedikt Terhechte
item.description: Talking about more conferences (because of course), iPad, and cool projects we've seen on the web.
item.itunes:summary: Talking about more conferences (because of course), iPad, and cool projects we've seen on the web.

item.title: 107: Xcode 10.2 beta 1 and the Swift Community Podcast
item.itunes:author: Bas Broek / Benedikt Terhechte
item.description: Starting fresh into the new year with a discussion on Xcode 10.2 beta 1, the Swift Community Podcast, and more
item.itunes:summary: Starting fresh into the new year with a discussion on Xcode 10.2 beta 1, the Swift Community Podcast, and more

item.title: 106: Refactoring across a large code base
item.itunes:author: Bas Broek / Benedikt Terhechte
item.description: A discussion on how we recently refactored our networking stack at XING, from planning to implementation. And emoji.
item.itunes:summary: A discussion on how we recently refactored our networking stack at XING, from planning to implementation. And emoji.

item.title: 105: Paul "John Sundell" Hudson
item.itunes:author: Bas Broek / Benedikt Terhechte / Paul Hudson
item.description: An interview with Paul Hudson about his career, talking about journalism, books, Venn diagrams, conference speaking and diversity.
item.itunes:summary: An interview with Paul Hudson about his career, talking about journalism, books, Venn diagrams, conference speaking and diversity.

item.title: 104: Conferences
item.itunes:author: Bas Broek / Benedikt Terhechte
item.description: A general discussion around iOS conferences: Why you should go there, what you should do there, and what to do if you want to give a talk. Also a short report on two conferences we just attended: NSSpain and Try Swift.
item.itunes:summary: A general discussion around iOS conferences: Why you should go there, what you should do there, and what to do if you want to give a talk. Also a short report on two conferences we just attended: NSSpain and Try Swift.

item.title: 103: A Philosophical Treatise on the Definition of Pro
item.itunes:author: Bas Broek / Benedikt Terhechte
item.description: Bas and Benedikt discuss what a "Pro" device represents at Apple, what a Mac Mini Pro could be, and why the Touchbar should not be in a Pro device.
item.itunes:summary: Bas and Benedikt discuss what a "Pro" device represents at Apple, what a Mac Mini Pro could be, and why the Touchbar should not be in a Pro device.

item.title: 102: The most awful static site engine
item.itunes:author: Bas Broek / Benedikt Terhechte
item.description: Where Bas and Benedikt discuss iPad, our awful static site engine, Swift scripting, Strings in Swift and Zelda.
item.itunes:summary: Where Bas and Benedikt discuss iPad, our awful static site engine, Swift scripting, Strings in Swift and Zelda.

item.title: 101: applicationDidFinishLaunching:
item.itunes:author: Bas Broek / Benedikt Terhechte
item.description: Where Bas and Benedikt discuss MacBook Keyboards, Swift's eigth birthday, Swift conferences, Mac Development, and Peanut-Butter Pizza.
item.itunes:summary: Where Bas and Benedikt discuss MacBook Keyboards, Swift's eigth birthday, Swift conferences, Mac Development, and Peanut-Butter Pizza.
